title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: As of today, as I run through every reply on my post on my experience, a lesson to others (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454175.msg62309929#msg62309929) , I con realize say, true true I need build my profile to standard. So today, I don agree to focus on other boards and leaving bounties. As part of my decision, for naija board, I go be major player with standard and helpful discussion/posts. Na time to learn , grow and help others most especially our country people.I also believe say, we fit grow this board to the point wey even people wey no be naija fit con see am as one of the best board for increasing their knowledge. The journey don start oooo, Abeg as bounties stuff full my activities, wetin I go do, make I leave am and carry on abi wetin una suggest.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: I'm happy for you because I see you becoming a serious and active user on other boards, especially the Naija local board, since you realize that bounties are a waste of time.First and foremost, I'd want to congratulate you on achieving member rank in this fantastic forum. I hope this serves as encouragement for you to continue improving yourself as well as learning and contributing to the forum as a whole.You can delete some of your bounty threads if you are uncomfortable with them now that you have entirely turned your attention away from bounty.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Action speaks better than voice/talking.Quote from: Hyphen(-) on July 10, 2023, 10:31:55 PMYou can delete some of your bounty threads if you are uncomfortable with them now that you have entirely turned your attention away from bounty.If you start to have good posts that are worth to be given merits, your past posts will not be a reason you will not be given the merit. But as Hyphen(-) posted already, if you feel uncomfortable with it, you can delete the useless ones.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: OP, I am very happy on this decision of yours to put a stop on bounty and face the important purpose why the forum was created. Bounty is like you are chasing peanuts when you can just be patient to build up your account and yourself in the forum. From my own view,I can see that you only have ten merits...if you can abandon your account and register a new one to start learning with. This will be better because I guess that your account has been noticed by reputable and generous merit givers in the forum,this might slow your quick growth in the forum. Like you said,you have been here for a while a would be able to earn for merit easily if you register a new account. Just my own suggestion.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Well thank God say you don come to yours normal senses onto say you don decide to leave bounty and focused to be more fruitful to the community than putting efforts on the bounty hunting. Actually nothing is wrong enrolling urself with bounties but it doesn't pay that much anymore unlike before back then 2017 I believe and is been a long time I focused on partaking in such activities anymore.Then back to your post history, I don't think you should delete them because I believe they are there for a reason because you would also likely to share your experience in time to come with other beginners while giving them advise just as we have been doing so far. If there are reflection you would tell them to take a look at your profile maybe they would learn new things from your profile. However those people who started before now some of them where bounty hunters then upgraded themselves to be more productive and useful to the forum.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on July 10, 2023, 10:15:02 PMI also believe say, we fit grow this board to the point wey even people wey no be naija fit con see am as one of the best board for increasing their knowledge. The journey don start oooo, Abeg as bounties stuff full my activities, wetin I go do, make I leave am and carry on abi wetin una suggest.I just look through your profile e belike some bounties related things still dey, make e no surprise you but I was once a bounty hunter. Infact I been dey promote airdrops dem for the forum as post, the first first time wey I begin write here. Na advice wey people give me wey make me focus attention on growing my account and today I dey where i dey so and to grown am self dun tayah me so I just relax small. I sabi your profile since and I like am as you dun leave bounty to focus on where better choppings fit come out. Bounty no bad entirely but make I give you wan secret always delete your reports and application after stakes are updated for that week or campaign has ended.Always keep your profile clean, plenty merit wey I get wen I just dey start to dey grow my account come from reviews and I no request for am self because back then request for review wasn't a thing. As people see me say I dey try dem go look my profile and na so I use dey get merits wey I no plan for self. Keep your posting record clean and change your boards of writing. E get some boards wey be say na waste of time to write because merits no dey flow there or better merits fit no come out like Altcoins and gambling board. Put your work for everybody face as person wey face hide here no dey get any reward.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Many of us started on a bounty way, like sae bounty na main thing for the board. Na with time when we come realize sae nothing wey d for bounty, make peso channel em energy to build em account than wasting em time in promoting project wey no go pay am or end up becoming a failed project. See where most of us the today(hero, senior, and full member rank). That's the decision we made few months back and we are enjoying the fruit of our labor today. That's the power of decision and passion to be a good poster. Em d okay as you come remove your mind and attention from where bounty d, to focus to build your account to be engaging in standard and helpful discussion for the forum. That one dey sha because no time wey peso wake up for the forum d too late for am. Where Mr. A reach, you go reach am someday with time. That's it, Trust the process and believe sae you go reach your desired rank.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Good decision my brother it's better late than never, well to encourage you there have been members like you who had once been a bounty, hunter, spammer and something no one with positive mindset for the forum would be proud of, but guess what they succeeded in turning their story around and changing their ways, a good example is Ddmr Ddmr, according to him he used to be a bounty spammer but now he is amongst the top members of the forum.I believe it's a good step for you and even though it takes time for you to actually see the results it would definitely show up.

Just follow up and tidy your profile as him talk. I believe say you go do well
